content.text: Thanks, you too! How is your day going?
Not too bad. I am in the process of moving back to my hometown. It's been a while since I've lived there.
Oh nice! That's exciting! Why are you moving back?
To be closer to my family. I've missed them a lot.
Yeah, they are. I'm looking forward to spending more time with them.
I'm sure they're looking forward to spending more time with you too!
So, what are you going to do with your house in the city?
I'm not sure yet. I might rent it out or sell it.
Renting it out could be a good way to make some extra money.
Yeah, it could be. I'll have to think about it.
Well, good luck with your move! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm sure it will be
